name: dazzlingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a light is dazzlingly bright, it is so bright that you cannot see for a short time after looking at it: By about ten in the morning the sun was already dazzlingly bright. Her short tennis dress and socks looked dazzlingly white against her brown legs. See
dazzling
in an extremely attractive or exciting way: a dazzlingly inventive author We spent a wonderful summer day on the edge of a dazzlingly beautiful lake. See
dazzling
More examplesFewer examplesThe new model has a dazzlingly bright screen and the best built-in stereo sound of any laptop.The growth of the southern auto industry has been dazzlingly fast.Her new novel is a dazzlingly ambitious tale spanning three decades.
